CustomField.description: Check this box if a Lead/Contact can only receive the auto responses one time. When this is unchecked, the Lead/Contact will receive the auto response each time they text the keyword.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box if a Lead/Contact can only receive the auto responses one time. When this is unchecked, the Lead/Contact will receive the auto response each time they text the keyword.
CustomField.label: Enforce Single Conversation
